abstract: NBC Sports may leave its long-time home at 30 Rockefeller Plaza in New York for a new home in Stamford, Conn.
snippet: NBC Sports may leave its long-time home at 30 Rockefeller Plaza in New York for a new home in Stamford, Conn.
lead_paragraph: NBC Sports may be heading out of its long-time home at 30 Rockefeller Plaza in New York.

headline.main: NBC Sports May Leave Rockefeller Plaza for Connecticut
